message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $13,500. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $11,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate you recognizing the value.  While I'm aiming for a price closer to $13,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $12,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,500 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
